title: Kanojo ga Mimai ni Konai Wake
synopsis: Seiji is a permanent part-timer. He has been dating a girl, Ai, for two years and he is now thinking about marrying her. But one day, he has a traffic accident and breaks his leg and becomes hospitalized. Ai promises,  with a smile, to visit him every day. But their relationship gradually changes after his hospitalization.
staff: [['Tatsumi', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Sawayama, Shinichiro', ['Script', ' Screenplay']]]
